00011 #include <Auxiliary/Linkable.hpp>

00014 /*  ========================================================================
00015     Message Identifier - 3GPP TS 23.041 V4.1.0 [9.4.1.2.2]
00016     ========================================================================*/
00018 class MessageIdentifier {
00019     public:
00021         enum Range {
00023             PlmnOperatorAssociationsMessageBegin = 0x0000,
00025             PlmnOperatorAssociationsMessageEnd = 0x03e7,
00026 
00028             LocationServicesRangeBegin = 0x03e8,
00030             LocationServicesRangeEnd = 0x03ec,
00031 
00033             UnsecureCellBroadcastDataDownloadRangeBegin = 0x1000,
00035             UnsecureCellBroadcastDataDownloadRangeEnd = 0x107f,
00036 
00038             SecureCellBroadcastDataDownloadRangeBegin = 0x1080,
00040             SecureCellBroadcastDataDownloadRangeEnd = 0x10ff,
00041 
00043             PlmnOperatorSpecificRangeBegin = 0xa000, 
00045             PlmnOperatorSpecificRangeEnd = 0xafff, 
00046 
00048             ForStandardizationInFutureVersionsRange1Begin = 0x03ec, 
00050             ForStandardizationInFutureVersionsRange1End = 0x0fff, 
00051             
00053             ForStandardizationInFutureVersionsRange2Begin = 0x1100, 
00055             ForStandardizationInFutureVersionsRange2End = 0x9fff, 
00056 
00058             ForPlmnOperatorSpecificInFutureVersionsRangeBegin = 0xb000, 
00060             ForPlmnOperatorSpecificInFutureVersionsRangeEnd = 0xfffe, 
00061         };
00062 
00064         enum Type {
00071             InPlmnOperatorAssociationsRange = 0x0000,
00072 
00074             LcsEOtdAssistanceDataMessage = 0x03e8,
00076             LcsDGpsCorrectionDataMessage = 0x03e9,
00078             LcsGpsEphemerisAndClockCorrectionDataMessage = 0x03ea,
00080             LcsGpsAlmanacAndOtherDataMessage = 0x03eb,
00081 
00086             InUnsecureCellBroadcastDataDownloadRange = 0x1000,
00087 
00092             InSecureCellBroadcastDataDownloadRange = 0x1080,
00093 
00099             InPlmnOperatorSpecificRange = 0xa000,
00100 
00105             InPlmnOperatorSpecificForFutureVersionsRange = 0x03ec,
00106 
00107 
00112             InReservedForFutureVersionsRange = 0xfffe,
00113 
00119             InvalidType = 0xffff
00120         };
00121 
00123         MessageIdentifier() : m_bit_field(0xffff) {};
00125         MessageIdentifier(UINT16 incoming_word) : m_bit_field(incoming_word) {};
00127         MessageIdentifier(const MessageIdentifier & mid) : m_bit_field(mid.m_bit_field) {};
00129         BOOLEAN operator == (const MessageIdentifier &mid) const {
00130                 return (m_bit_field == mid.m_bit_field); 
00131         }
00132 
00134         UINT16 Get() const { return (m_bit_field.Get()); }
00135 
00137         Type GetType() const;
00139         void SetType(Type type);
00140 
00142         void Clear() { m_bit_field.Clear(); }
00143 
00144     private:
00145         BitField16 m_bit_field;     
00146 };
00147 
00148 
00149 /*  ========================================================================
00150     Message Identifier Range 
00151     ========================================================================*/
00153 class MessageIdentifierRange : public Linkable<MessageIdentifierRange> {
00154     public:
00156         MessageIdentifierRange();
00158         MessageIdentifierRange(const MessageIdentifier &begin, const MessageIdentifier &end = MessageIdentifier());
00160         MessageIdentifierRange(const MessageIdentifierRange & midrange) 
00161             : m_begin(midrange.m_begin), m_end(midrange.m_end) {};
00163         BOOLEAN operator == (const MessageIdentifierRange &mid_range) const;
00164 
00166         const MessageIdentifier& Begin() const { return (m_begin); }
00168         void Begin(const MessageIdentifier &begin) { m_begin = begin; }
00170         const MessageIdentifier& End() const { return (m_end); }
00172         void End(const MessageIdentifier &end) { m_end = end; }
00174         BOOLEAN IsValid() { return (m_begin.Get() <= m_end.Get());}
00175 
00176     private:
00177         MessageIdentifier m_begin;
00178         MessageIdentifier m_end;
00179 };
00180 
00181 /*  ========================================================================
00182     Message Identifier Container 
00183     ========================================================================*/
00185 class MessageIdentifierContainer {
00186     public:
00187         enum {
00188             // defines the no of mid-ranges per allocation
00189             c_inrease_step = 32,
00190             // defines the maximum number of ranges per container
00191             c_max_apoxi_no_of_message_identifiers = 128
00192         };
00193 
00194         // this class hold a pair of ids, as MessageIdentifierRange uses more memory
00195         class MessageIdentifierPair {
00196             public:
00197                 MessageIdentifierPair() : m_begin(0xFFFF), m_end(0xFFFF) {};
00198                 MessageIdentifierPair(MessageIdentifier begin, MessageIdentifier end) :
00199                     m_begin(begin.Get()), m_end(end.Get()) {};
00200                 MessageIdentifierPair(UINT16 begin, UINT16 end) :
00201                     m_begin(begin), m_end(end) {};
00202 
00203                 MessageIdentifierPair(const MessageIdentifierPair & midpair) :
00204                     m_begin(midpair.m_begin), m_end(midpair.m_end) {};
00205                 MessageIdentifierPair(const MessageIdentifierRange & range) :
00206                     m_begin(range.Begin().Get()), m_end(range.End().Get()) {};
00207                 
00208                 BOOLEAN operator == (const MessageIdentifierPair &midpair) const {
00209                     return midpair.m_begin==m_begin && midpair.m_end==m_end;
00210                 }
00211                 BOOLEAN operator == (const MessageIdentifierRange &midrange) const {
00212                     return midrange.Begin()==m_begin && midrange.End()==m_end;
00213                 }
00214 
00215                 UINT16 m_begin;
00216                 UINT16 m_end;
00217         };
00218 
00219         MessageIdentifierContainer();
00220 
00221         MessageIdentifierContainer(INT preallocsize);
00222 
00223         MessageIdentifierContainer(const MessageIdentifierContainer &midcont);
00224 
00225         ~MessageIdentifierContainer();
00226 
00227         MessageIdentifierContainer& operator =(const MessageIdentifierContainer &midcont);
00228 
00229         // appends a ranges distinct means, only a lookup if it exists is done, before appending
00230         BOOLEAN AppendDistinct(const MessageIdentifierRange & range);
00231         // returns if the range exactly exists, means the given range is inside the container
00232         BOOLEAN Exists(const MessageIdentifierRange & range) const;
00233         // clears the range, without deleting the container, means reusing memory
00234         BOOLEAN Clear() {
00235             m_no_of_pairs = 0;
00236             return TRUE;
00237         }
00238         // removes the range if it is existing as the given range
00239         BOOLEAN Remove(const MessageIdentifierRange & range);
00240         // operator []
00241         const MessageIdentifierRange operator [] (INT idx) const { 
00242             return MessageIdentifierRange(m_pair[idx].m_begin,m_pair[idx].m_end);
00243         }
00244         // returns the number of MessageIdentifierRanges 
00245         INT GetSize() const { return m_no_of_pairs; }
00246 
00247         // merges a complete container with AppendMerged
00248         BOOLEAN Merge(const MessageIdentifierContainer &midcont) ;
00249         // optimize the complete container iterative, means that all overlapping ranges are merged
00250         BOOLEAN Optimize();
00251         // merges the container to a given maximum number of ranges 
00252         BOOLEAN Limit(INT limit);
00253         // appends a pair at correct position with inserting
00254         BOOLEAN AppendSorted(const MessageIdentifierPair & pair);
00255 
00256 #if defined(_DEBUG) && defined(APOXI_RTOS_WIN32)
00257         void DbgOut() const;
00258         void SelfTest() const;
00259         void FitTest(const MessageIdentifierContainer & cont) const;
00260 #endif
00261 
00262     private:
00263         // allocates the array
00264         void Allocate(INT size);
00265         // assigns the buffer from cont to the object and clears buffer of cont
00266         void Assign(MessageIdentifierContainer & cont);
00267 
00268         // appends a range merged, means that overlapping areas are taken into account
00269         BOOLEAN AppendMerged(const MessageIdentifierPair & pair);
00270         // appends a pair without check and merging
00271         BOOLEAN Append(const MessageIdentifierPair & pair);
00272 
00273 
00274         MessageIdentifierPair * m_pair;
00275         INT m_no_of_pairs;
00276         INT m_preallocsize;
00277 };
